title: Android Auto stopped working after December update
content:
Android Auto stopped working in mid December after I updated my phone.

I have tried: Updating phone, updating Android Auto app, deleting and re-installing Android Auto, purchasing a new data cable, updating Kenwood DMX8018S. Have tested with an iPhone and Apple CarPlay works fine. Tested with a Pixel (I have a Pixel 2 XL) and it did not work.

Same issue: 
https://issuetracker.google.com/issues/123655654 
https://issuetracker.google.com/issues/123575853
